name: PixelBall [prototype]
description:
My game submission for #devtober 2021. A standard pinball game with awesome art style.

Currently there's no Nudging. Remember this is only the prototype which I'll work on in the future, so a lot of things will change. But the art style will stay.

So happy pinballing, which highscore can you get?

Keyboard:
  • A | left flipper
  • D | right flipper
  • Space, Enter | Plunger
  • Esc | Menu
  • F1 | Reset
Controller:
  • LB, LT | left flipper
  • RB, RT | right flipper
  • A | Plunger

For more updates, check here: https://twitter.com/TackRadGames
